title: ARIA DevTools
creator: Roombelt
description: This browser extension provides a visual representation of the accessibility tree for your web application. Easily spot missing ARIA labels, misused ARIA roles and lack of proper keyboard handling.
guideline: WCAG 2.1 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1
assists: Modifying the presentation of web pages
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
